类的使用
org.apache.catalina.connector.Response

  • 使用Response的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.catalina  
    org.apache.catalina.authenticator
    This package contains Authenticator implementations for the various supported authentication methods (BASIC, DIGEST, and FORM).
    org.apache.catalina.connector  
    org.apache.catalina.core  
    org.apache.catalina.ha.session  
    org.apache.catalina.ha.tcp  
    org.apache.catalina.realm
    This package contains Realm implementations for the various supported realm technologies for authenticating users and identifying their associated roles.
    org.apache.catalina.startup  
    org.apache.catalina.valves
    This package contains a variety of small Valve implementations that do not warrant being packaged separately.

      参数类型为Response的org.apache.catalina中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Valve.event(Request request, Response response, CometEvent event)
      Process a Comet event.
      boolean Realm.hasResourcePermission(Request request, Response response, SecurityConstraint[] constraint, Context context)
      Perform access control based on the specified authorization constraint.
      boolean Realm.hasUserDataPermission(Request request, Response response, SecurityConstraint[] constraint)
      Enforce any user data constraint required by the security constraint guarding this request URI.
      void Valve.invoke(Request request, Response response)
      Perform request processing as required by this Valve.
      void Container.invoke(Request request, Response response)
      已过时。 
      Unused. Will be removed in Tomcat 8.0.x.
      void AccessLog.log(Request request, Response response, long time)
      Add the request/response to the access log using the specified processing time.
      void Container.logAccess(Request request, Response response, long time, boolean useDefault)
      Log a request/response that was destined for this container but has been handled earlier in the processing chain so that the request/response still appears in the correct access logs.
